Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing are sometimes referred to collectively as PHYSICAL damage.

Damage Resistance, Vulnerability and Immunity

Resistance: If a creature or an object is RESISTANT to a damage type, damage of that type is halved against it. Vulnerability: If a creature or an object is VULNERABLE to a damage type, damage of that type is doubled against it. Immunity: If a creature or object is IMMUNE to a damage type, damage of that type is completely negated.Resistances and
